span.span: Called to determine the postback data collection.

summary.span: 若要了解如何开发 ASP.NET 移动应用，请参阅 ASP.NET 移动应用和网站。

remarks.format: ## Remarks 由于某些设备处理回发的方式不同于其他设备, 因此此方法允许适配器修改该集合。Because some devices handle postback differently from others, this method allows the adapter to modify the collection. 此方法的和实现将收集控件数据 (如果发布来自其他页)。The and implementations of this method gather control data if the post originated from a different page. 实现对回发数据执行 CHTML 特定的处理。The implementation performs CHTML-specific handling of postback data.

in all cases.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 适配器可以选择处理异常并呈现错误消息。An adapter can choose to handle the exception and render an error message. 如果处理错误`true` , 该方法将返回。The method returns `true` if it handles the error. 对于类, 此实现不执行任何操作, `false`并返回。 For the class, this implementation does nothing and returns `false`. 对于类, 此实现将格式化 WML 的错误并返回`true`。 For the class, this implementation formats the error for WML and returns `true`.

remarks.format: ## Remarks 对于类, 只为每个请求呈现活动窗体。For the class, only the active form is rendered for each request. 对于类, 如果大小允许, 可将多个窗体合并为一个卡片组。For the class, multiple forms can be combined as cards into a single deck, if size permits.
